overview: Indonesia 2045. When getting an assignment from the campus, Meara meets a young entrepreneur named, Marshal, the cofounder of Go Green which she is currently promoting. That meeting made Meara fall in love with Marshal, Meara asked for help from Renata, her best friend, who is very attached to technology. Marshal actually wanted Renata, which made Magic Life Ice Cream that he founded grow after several years of being stagnant.
title: 2045 Apa Ada Cinta
